          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A "nagy bombázás"</string>
            <string language="en-US">The „great bombing”</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die?great Bombardierung?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bombardement de ?great ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O bombardeio do?great?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il bombardamento del?great?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο βομβαρδισμός ?great;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El bombardeo del?great?</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A "nagy bombázás": 3,9 milliárd évvel ezelőtt a Holddal és a Földdel nagyon sok kisebb égitest ütközött</string>
            <string language="en-US">The „great bombing”: 3.9 billion years ago a lot of small-sized planet impacted with the Moon and the Earth</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">naprendszer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">bolygó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">bolygórendszer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Nap</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die?great Bombardierung?: vor 3.9 Milliarde Jahren 
Menge kleiner Planet wirkte sich mit dem Mond und der Masse aus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bombardement de ?great ? : il y a 3.9 milliards 
d'ans de beaucoup de planète de petite taille a effectué avec la 
lune et la terre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O bombardeio do?great?: 3.9 bilhão anos há de 
muitos do planeta small-sized impactou com a lua e a terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il bombardamento del?great?: 3.9 miliardo anni fa di
pianeta di piccole dimensioni molto ha avuto effetto su con la 
luna e la terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ?great που βομβαρδίζει;: 3.9 
δισεκατομμύριο έτη πριν πολύς μικρός πλανήτης που επηρεάζεται με
το φεγγάρι και τη γη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El bombardeo del?great?: hace 3.9 mil millones años
de muchos del planeta small-sized afectó con la luna y la tierra</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
